Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_wnirtzas&referenceId=1_wnirtzas&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: U.S. shares fell on Thursday, with the Nasdaq diving as Facebook-owner Meta Platforms' dour forecast jolted the broader tech sector. Jobs data takes center stage on Friday, when the U.S. Labor Department publishes the January Nonfarm Payrolls report.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rrmzSl
